description: So there you are in the delivery room. Standing beside your beautiful wife as she sweats and screams and cries. She is having a baby, your child, and you are charged with the role of emotional support. Scared? You should be. When a woman is in labor there is no right answer, but there is a right attitude that will save you hours of headache and pain before, during, and after the birth. Learn how to be the rock for her and you will not only save yourself from trouble, you will also gain valuable points months later when it's time for another 3 AM feeding. Prepare yourself for the hospital labor room and focus on being a father. This guide will be the best tool you've ever bought, just make sure she doesn't see it! Read all about it in this comprehensive ebook.
